pages.title: Lens of Ender
pages.text: A Lens of Ender can be added to a Solar Panel to generate energy even if blocks are above the Solar Panel. It created by crafting a Photoelectric Pane and right-clicking it on an Enderman or Endermite.
Right-click a Photoelectric Pane on an Enderman or Endermite to make it a Lens of Ender.
